subject: Tennis
Sony Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The former tennis champion Ivan Lendl coached Andy Murray to his first Grand Slam titles, but Murray will seek to regain that winning form without Lendl, who remains a supporter.
snippet: The former tennis champion Ivan Lendl coached Andy Murray to his first Grand Slam titles, but Murray will seek to regain that winning form without Lendl, who remains a supporter.
